title: Episode 103: One Piece-Alabasta Arc (Part 1)
author: Weeb and Noob Watch Anime Podcast
description: A podcast discussion covering the Alabasta Arc of One Piece, including the transition from Drum Island to the desert kingdom. The hosts discuss the introduction of Ace and Smoker, as well as Baroque Works' binary structure and efforts to help Vivi. Note: This episode covers a range of episodes including Episode 103, not exclusively this episode.

spoilerWarning.spoilerNotes: Podcast discusses the entire Alabasta Arc, which extends beyond Episode 103

title: Episode 103 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 103 containing episode summary, character debuts, manga chapters covered, trivia, and production information.

title: One Piece: Baroque Works, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: An article explaining the Baroque Works organization, its structure, members, and role in the Alabasta Arc. Relevant to understanding the context of the officer agents' gathering in Episode 103.

spoilerWarning.spoilerNotes: Contains information about Baroque Works' complete structure and eventual fate

title: 20 Things You Didn't Know About The Alabasta Arc In 'One Piece'
author: Anna Lindwasser (Ranker)
description: A list-style article featuring trivia and lesser-known facts about the Alabasta Arc, including production details, character information, and story analysis.

spoilerWarning.spoilerNotes: Contains spoilers for the entire Alabasta Arc

title: One Piece: Every Officer Agent of Baroque Works, Ranked
author: Game Rant
description: A ranking article analyzing all the officer agents of Baroque Works who debut or appear in episodes around Episode 103, including Mr. 1, Miss Doublefinger, Mr. 4, and Miss Merry Christmas.

spoilerWarning.spoilerNotes: Discusses officer agents' abilities, battles, and eventual outcomes
